name: Dreamcast Gigabyte Disc Image
summary: A GDI file is a plain-text descriptor file used by Sega Dreamcast emulators, such as Redream and Flycast. It lists the contents and layout of a Dreamcast GD-ROM disc, including the order of tracks and the location of the data stored in accompanying .BIN and .RAW files. Together, the GDI file and its referenced files form a complete copy of the original game disc.
